Update matching font defaults for text geoms

update_geom_font_defaults.Rd

Updates ggplot2::geom_label and ggplot2::geom_text font defaults

Usage

update_geom_font_defaults(
  family = if (package_font_installed()) "Gill Sans Nova" else "sans",
  face = "plain",
  size = 3.5,
  color = "#1a1a1a"
)

Arguments

family

Font family, default "Lato".

face

Font face, default "plain".

size

font size in mm.

color

Font color, default "#1a1a1a".

Examples

update_geom_font_defaults()

On this page
